structure.unit: LICENSING OF MOTOR VEHICLES, OPERATORS, AND TRAILERS

law.catch_line: Proportionate fees for commercial vehicle operated after registration year began.
law.text: If any person offers a commercial vehicle for registration after April 1 of any year by reason of not having operated such vehicle on the public highways after April 1 of that year, the registration fee shall be as many twelfths of the annual fee as there are unexpired months in the registration year.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 113, sec. 2, effective April 1, 1991. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 6, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 133, sec. 8, effective June 19, 1976. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 10, effective January 1, 1967. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2739g-4.
